name: Kaushal H. Nagar
about: iOS Software Engineer with 1.5+ years of experience in Swift, SwiftUI, specializing in building high-performance applications with modern iOS architectures. Proven expertise in the full software development lifecycle for iOS applications with a focus on delivering impactful user experiences.

Proven track record in leading complete mobile app lifecycles - from concept to deployment - for diverse projects including CRM, e-commerce, logistics, and healthcare applications and Passionate about clean architecture, efficient coding practices, and emerging technologies.
Skilled in native iOS development with deep knowledge of frameworks like SwiftUI, UIKit, Core Location, and MapKit. Experience in optimizing app performance and implementing real-time features.
Passionate about clean architecture and efficient coding practices, with experience in implementing XCTest for thorough testing and maintaining high code quality standards.
Technical leader with experience in product-led growth approaches, having delivered 7+ mobile applications across various domains with measurable impact on user engagement.

skills.Programming Languages: C, Python, Swift, React Native, SwiftUI, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript
skills.iOS Frameworks: UIKit, Core Animation, Core Location, AVFoundation, MapKit, CocoaPods
skills.Software Development Lifecycle: Requirements analysis, Design, Implementation, Testing, Deployment, Maintenance
skills.Databases: SQL, SQLite, Core Data, Realm DB ( By MongoDB )
skills.Developer Tools: Git, GitHub, GitLab, VS Code, Xcode, Pycharm, IntelliJ IDEA, Android Studio, Postman, GitHub Copilot
skills.Testing: XCTest, Unit Testing, UI Testing, Debugging
skills.Designing Tools: Figma, Adobe XD, Storyboards, Auto Layout, Photoshop, Lightroom, After Effects, Premiere Pro
skills.Soft Skills: Team Leadership, Communication, Problem Solving, Analytical Skills, Time Management
skills.Other Skills: Ethical Hacking, Rubik's Cube Solver (2 Min)

details.title: Native iOS Development:
details.description: Developed production-grade iOS applications using Swift and UIKit, following modern iOS architecture patterns.

details.title: Real-Time Location Services:
details.description: Implemented Core Location and MapKit for real-time tracking with 95% accuracy, optimizing battery usage while maintaining precise location updates.

details.title: Performance Optimization:
details.description: Developed features handling 6GB+ data with <50MB memory usage through efficient memory management and optimized data handling techniques.

details.title: Quality Assurance:
details.description: Implemented comprehensive Unit Testing using XCTest, achieving major code coverage and ensuring reliable, bug-free releases.

details.title: Offline-First Architecture:
details.description: Designed and implemented robust offline capabilities using SQLite and Core Data, with automatic synchronization when connectivity is restored.

details.title: Data Synchronization:
details.description: Developed conflict resolution strategies for bi-directional sync between local storage and cloud services, ensuring data consistency.
Led end-to-end development of iOS e-commerce application, delivering 30+ dynamic screens within tight deadlines while maintaining code quality.

experience.company: Google Developer Student Club & Ed-Tech Platforms

responsibilities.title: Google Developer Student Club Lead:
responsibilities.description: Founded and led Google developer community, organizing 25+ technical workshops on GCP, Kotlin, Flutter, and resume building. Organized GDSC WOW Gujarat 2023 (700+ attendees).

responsibilities.title: Technical Community Head:
responsibilities.description: Led and Managed developer communities for Algozenith, Coding Blocks, Coding Ninja, Skill-Lync, and TechLearn, fostering technical growth among members.

projects.name: Music Player (iOS Swift App)
projects.description: Built a fully functional music player with audio playback and media controls using AVFoundation and AVPlayer.

projects.name: Tic-Tac-Toe Game (iOS Swift App)
projects.description: Developed game logic and dynamic UI updates using Swift, demonstrating understanding of iOS app architecture.

projects.name: E-commerce App (iOS Swift App)
projects.description: Designed and developed a full-fledged e-commerce platform with product listings.
